Research Reminder [Token-like] ACA ACA
Token Token !token

You gain 2 DP. >0 DP: Draw a card. >1 DP: Store the top card of your deck. >1 DP: Destroy the top card of your deck. >2 DP: Search your deck for a basic medium card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. >3 DP: Draw a card. >5 DP: Draw two cards. 1
Set Reminder [Token-like] ACA ACA
Token Token !token
1 >When a quester card is put into your set area, put it into a set already there with two or fewer cards in it, or put it into a new set. >Sets containing three cards are known as complete sets. >When you complete a set, trigger the applicable abilities of the questers in the set. >Sets containing only cards of the same suit are mono sets. >Sets containing only cards of different suits are trio sets. >Sets containing only cards with the same cost value are equivalent sets. >Sets containing only cards with cost values that form a line (such as {4}, {5}, and 6 or {6}, 7 and 8) are consecutive sets. >Complete sets that are one or more of mono, trio, equivalent, and/or consecutive are glorious. >When you assemble a glorious set, each opponent draws a card. >You win the game if you’ve assembled three complete glorious sets. 1
